Class BurnedInfluence

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.influence.Influence
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.influence.BurnedInfluence
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.interfaces.IInfluence
public class BurnedInfluence
extends Influence

BurnedInfluence damages the target, reduces the size of the target and increases the motion of the target including both animation speed and movement speed.
